org.freelte.turbodecoder

Class LteSpecs.BitSymbols

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.freelte.turbodecoder.LteSpecs.BitSymbols
  • Enclosing class:
    LteSpecs

    public static class LteSpecs.BitSymbols
extends java.lang.Object
    Bit mapping used for LLR. Bit 0 = 1, 1 = -1. The encoding informs the metric in MAP the scaling of each bit estimate.
